title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.5 - Accounting manual
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.5 - Accounting manual

State Regulations
A handbook of accounting policies, standards, and
practices governing the accounts of a business enterprise or other entity; it
includes the classification of accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
